text.more: The Occupation Space links 270 occupations according to their revealed skill-proximity. Nodes size is proportional to their centrality. It is derived from occupation switches observed in a representative panel of French workforce (DADS-panel). For full methodology, Joyez, C., Laffineur, C. The occupation space: network structure, centrality and the potential of labor mobility in the French labor market. Appl Netw Sci 7, 16 (2022). https://doi.org/10.1007/s41109-022-00453-3
text.intro: The French Occupation Space from Joyez & Laffineur, 2022
text.title: Occupation Space
